description: Generate high-quality AI renders with this prompt that creates a 1/7 scale commercialized figurine of any chosen character in a realistic style. The figurine is displayed on a computer desk with a transparent acrylic base, placed next to the life-sized real person in matching attire who carefully cleans the figure with a fine brush. Set in a modern, brightly lit studio room with a collection of toys and action figures, this prompt is perfect for collectors, hobbyists, and realistic figure photography projects.

Create a stunning AI-generated 1/7 scale collectible figurine designed with lifelike detail. The figure is displayed on a miniature beach setting, complete with sand, seashells, and soft ocean waves. Encased inside a transparent glass bottle, the scene feels like a premium diorama with realistic lighting and shadows. This AI prompt is perfect for collectors, artists, and creators who love unique figure photography, toy art, and imaginative display concepts.
